DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Two Enteral Nutrition Strategies Mechanically Ventilated Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult ( > 18 an ) Mechanical ventilation > 72 hour Planned enteral nutrition Informed consent Body Mass Index < 20 kg/m2 Enteral nutrition non indicate ( ileus , splanchnic ischemia.. ) Shock ( use catecholamine , arterial blood pressure < 90 mmHg , peripheral hypoperfusion , elevation lactate > x 1,5 normal value ) Contraindications gastric tube Pregnancy Previous enrollment present study
